message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested in the product, but $8500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. Would you be willing to come down to $7500?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $8000?
